title: Check Malicious utility from Kutools
extract: 1. Firstly, please enable the Check Malicious utility by clicking Kutools > Options, then click Security tab, and then check the Check Malicious email box in the Options dialog box.
extract_html: 1. Firstly, please enable the Check Malicious utility by clicking Kutools > Options, then click Security tab, and then check the Check Malicious email box in the Options dialog box.
